title: SetLatchVarValue (Method)
text:
METHOD SetLatchVarValue
Sets an ITypedValue instance, describing the current value of an optional latch variable.
This method is an enhancement/a replacement of methods IAlarm2.SetLatchVar1Value and
IAlarm2.SetLatchVar2Value.

rows.Name: iWhichLatchVar
rows.Comment:
The 1-based index of the latch variable. Specify 1 to obtain the same result like
method IAlarm.GetLatchVar1Value and 2 to obtain the same result like
method IAlarm.GetLatchVar2Value. All greater values correspond to the optional
additional latch variables.

rows: An instance of ITypedValue containing the value to set
